movies.title: Dragon Ball Z: Gather Together! Goku's World
movies.originalTitle: Doragon bôru Z: Atsumare! Gokû Wârudo
movies.plot: Goku embarks on a time-travel adventure to stop Cell.
movies.simplePlot: Goku embarks on a time-travel adventure to stop Cell.

biography.bio: Masako Nozawa was born on October 25, 1936 in Nippori, Arakawa, Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Dragon Ball Z (1989), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009) and The Gutsy Frog (1972). She was previously married to Masaaki Tsukada.
biography.name: Masako Nozawa

biography.bio: Mayumi Tanaka was born on January 15, 1955 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Dragon Ball Z (1989), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009) and One Piece Film Z (2012).
biography.name: Mayumi Tanaka

biography.bio: Hiromi Tsuru was born on March 29, 1960 in Kanagawa, Japan. She is an actress, known for Dragon Ball Z (1989), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009) and Dragon Ball Super (2015).
biography.name: Hiromi Tsuru

biography.bio: Takeshi Kusao was born on November 20, 1965 in Saitama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Akira (1988), Dragon Ball Z (1989) and Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009). He has been married to Yuka Saitô since May 20, 2015.
biography.name: Takeshi Kusao

biography.bio: Kôhei Miyauchi was born on August 4, 1929 in Kagoshima, Japan as Takayuki Miyauchi. He was an actor, known for Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984), Dragon Ball Z (1989) and The Castle of Cagliostro (1979). He died on June 2, 1995.
biography.name: Kôhei Miyauchi

biography.bio: Takeshi Aono was born on June 19, 1936 in Asahikawa, Hokkaido, Japan. He was an actor, known for Ninja Scroll (1993), D.Gray-man (2006) and Metropolis (2001). He died on April 9, 2012 in Hachiôji, Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Takeshi Aono

biography.bio: Ryô Horikawa was born on February 1, 1958 in Osaka, Japan as Makoto Horikawa. He is an actor, known for Dragon Ball Z (1989), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009) and Les chevaliers du zodiaque (1986).
biography.name: Ryô Horikawa

biography.bio: Ryûsei Nakao was born on February 5, 1951 in Tokyo, Japan as Tomoharu Takeo. He is an actor, known for Dragon Ball Z (1989), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009) and Kenshin le Vagabond - Le Chapitre de la Mémoire (1999).
biography.name: Ryûsei Nakao

biography.bio: Norio Wakamoto was born on October 18, 1945 in Yamaguchi, Japan as Noriaki Wakamoto. He is known for his work on Metropolis (2001), Ninja Scroll (1993) and Dragon Ball Z (1989).
biography.name: Norio Wakamoto

biography.bio: Jôji Yanami was born on August 30, 1931 in Tokyo Prefecture, Japan as Shigemitsu Shirato. He is an actor, known for Dragon Ball Z (1989), Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009) and Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984).
biography.name: Jôji Yanami
